title: Front Cover
content: Antillean manatee nine years after being released into the wild in a seagrass meadow in the Costa dos Corais Marine Protected Area, Brazil. The cover image related to Research Article [https://doi.org/10.1002/aqc.4174] “Long-term tracking reveals the influence of body size and habitat type on the home range of Antillean manatees (Trichechus manatus manatusT)” by Normande et al. Photo credit: Luciano Candisani.
siteTitle: Wiley: Aquatic Conservation: Marine and Freshwater Ecosystems: Table of Contents
